Our human desires have leaned on maximizing the resources of this world, at a cost so high that we are not thinking of taking responsibility. But the direst part of the destruction of the natural world, most aren’t capable of understanding it..

I thought I have enough time to increase my resources before moving to a safer place like Canada, New Zealand or the European Union, but that may not be the case. As we are trying to cope up with the significant problems caused by the pandemic, we are moving away from the opportunity to protect what is left of the natural world. I will outline in different chapters the problems why we are putting ourselves on a highly volatile situation - ones that we will not be able to control.
